function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unstructured interviews may lead to inconsistent data collection and analysis.","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased insights could impact decision-making.","Mitigation":"Standardize interview questions and use multiple data analysis techniques.","Technologies":"Interview transcription and coding software.","People":"Researchers, interviewees","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Purposive sampling may introduce selection bias into the study.","Impact":"Results may not be representative of the entire population.","Mitigation":"Use multiple sampling techniques and compare results with broader data sets.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, data visualization tools.","People":"Researchers, participants","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Zoom video conferencing services may be vulnerable to security breaches and privacy concerns.","Impact":"Unauthorized access to interview data and privacy violations.","Mitigation":"Use secure video conferencing platforms and data encryption.","Technologies":"Secure video conferencing software, data encryption tools.","People":"Interviewees, researchers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
